info.name: Tawseela Delivery API
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman Collection for Tawseela Delivery Service Backend API

## API Overview
Tawseela is a delivery service platform connecting customers, drivers, and store owners. This collection provides complete API testing coverage.

## Authentication
The API uses JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer {{auth_token}}
```

## User Roles
- **customer**: Regular customers placing orders
- **driver**: Delivery drivers
- **store_owner**: Store owners managing their stores and products
- **admin**: System administrators with full access

## Environment Variables
- `baseUrl`: API base URL (default: http://localhost:5000/api)
- `auth_token`: JWT token obtained from login
- `user_id`: Current user ID
- `admin_token`: Admin authentication token
- `store_owner_token`: Store owner authentication token
- `driver_token`: Driver authentication token
- `customer_token`: Customer authentication token

## Data Models
- **User**: Contains user profile, location, wallet, and driver documents
- **Store**: Store information with location, working hours, and products
- **Order**: Order details including items, payment, and delivery info
- **Product**: Product information with pricing and inventory
- **Transaction**: Payment transactions and refunds
- **Notification**: System notifications for users

## Error Handling
All endpoints return consistent error responses:
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Error message"
}
```

## Rate Limiting
API implements rate limiting: 100 requests per 15 minutes per IP.

Generated on: 2025-11-20

item.name: üîê General Authentication
item.description: General auth endpoints that work with role-based user creation

request.description:
Register a new user with email, password, and role

**Valid Roles:**
- `customer` - Regular customers
- `driver` - Delivery drivers
- `store_owner` - Store owners
- `admin` - System administrators

Authenticate user and receive JWT token

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `user` - User profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Get current authenticated user profile

**Requires:** Valid JWT token in Authorization header
Update current user profile information

Logout user and invalidate token

**Effect:** Clears authentication cookie

Request password reset token via email
**Note:** Email sending is disabled in development

Reset password using reset token
**URL Parameter:**
- `resettoken` - Token received via email

Verify user email address

**URL Parameter:**
- `verificationtoken` - Token received during registration

Register a new customer

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Customer profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Login as customer and receive JWT token

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Customer profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Get current authenticated customer profile

**Requires:** Valid JWT token in Authorization header
Update current customer profile information

Update customer password

**Requires:** Current password and new password

Request password reset token for customer via email

**Note:** Email sending is disabled in development

Reset customer password using reset token

**URL Parameter:**
- `resettoken` - Token received via email

Logout customer and invalidate token

**Effect:** Clears authentication cookie

Register a new driver

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Driver profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Login as driver and receive JWT token

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Driver profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Get current authenticated driver profile

**Requires:** Valid JWT token in Authorization header
Update current driver profile information

Update driver password

**Requires:** Current password and new password

Request password reset token for driver via email

**Note:** Email sending is disabled in development

Reset driver password using reset token

**URL Parameter:**
- `resettoken` - Token received via email

Logout driver and invalidate token

**Effect:** Clears authentication cookie

Register a new store owner
**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Store owner profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Login as store owner and receive JWT token

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Store owner profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Get current authenticated store owner profile

**Requires:** Valid JWT token in Authorization header
Update current store owner profile information

Update store owner password

**Requires:** Current password and new password

Request password reset token for store owner via email

**Note:** Email sending is disabled in development

Reset store owner password using reset token

**URL Parameter:**
- `resettoken` - Token received via email

Logout store owner and invalidate token

**Effect:** Clears authentication cookie

Register a new admin

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Admin profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Login as admin and receive JWT token

**Response includes:**
- `token` - JWT token for subsequent requests
- `data` - Admin profile information
- Cookie with token (httpOnly)

Get current authenticated admin profile

**Requires:** Valid JWT token in Authorization header
Update current admin profile information

Update admin password

**Requires:** Current password and new password

Request password reset token for admin via email

**Note:** Email sending is disabled in development

Reset admin password using reset token

**URL Parameter:**
- `resettoken` - Token received via email

Logout admin and invalidate token

**Effect:** Clears authentication cookie

Get all users (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
Get user information by ID
Update user information

Delete user account (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required

Update user location with GPS coordinates

**Body Parameters:**
- `type`: Always "Point"
- `coordinates`: [longitude, latitude]
- `address`: Human readable address

Get all active stores with owner information

**Access:** Public endpoint

Get store details by ID with owner information

**Access:** Public endpoint

Create a new store (Store Owner only)

**Access:** Store Owner role required
**Auto-filled:** owner field from authenticated user

Update store information

**Access:** Store Owner (owner) or Admin

Delete store and all associated products

**Access:** Store Owner (owner) or Admin

Get stores owned by specific user

**Access:** Owner themselves or Admin

Add new product to store

**Access:** Store Owner (owner) or Admin
**Auto-filled:** store field from URL parameter

Update product information in store

**Access:** Store Owner (owner) or Admin

Delete product from store

**Access:** Store Owner (owner) or Admin

Get all orders (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Includes:** Customer, store, and driver information

Get order details by ID

**Access:** Order participants (customer, store owner, driver) or Admin

Create new order (Customer only)

**Access:** Customer role required
**Auto-filled:** customer field from authenticated user

**Order Status Flow:**
1. `pending` - Initial state
2. `confirmed` - Store accepted
3. `preparing` - Food preparation
4. `on_way` - Out for delivery
5. `delivered` - Completed
6. `cancelled` - Cancelled order

Update order information

**Access:** Order participants or Admin
**Limited Fields:** Typically notes and delivery instructions

Delete order (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Note:** Should only be used for administrative purposes

Get orders for specific customer

**Access:** Customer themselves or Admin

Get orders for specific store

**Access:** Store owner or Admin

Get orders assigned to specific driver

**Access:** Driver themselves or Admin

Update order status

**Valid Statuses:**
- `pending` - Initial state
- `confirmed` - Store accepted
- `preparing` - Food preparation
- `on_way` - Out for delivery
- `delivered` - Completed
- `cancelled` - Cancelled order

**Access:** Order participants based on role

Process payment for order

**Payment Methods:**
- `cash` - Cash on delivery
- `wallet` - User wallet balance
- `paymob` - Paymob gateway
- `fawry` - Fawry payment

**Note:** Integrates with payment gateways
Get payment details by ID
Get all payments for specific user
Get payments for specific order

Process payment refund (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Notes:** Requires admin approval and refund processing

Get all registered drivers

**Includes:** Driver profile and verification status
Get driver details by ID
Update driver profile information

Delete driver account (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required

Update driver verification documents

**Document Types:**
- `nationalId` - National ID number
- `license` - Driver's license number
- `photo` - Driver photo URL

**Status:** Automatically set to 'pending' for admin review

Verify driver documents (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Valid Statuses:**
- `approved` - Driver verified
- `rejected` - Documents rejected
- `pending` - Under review

Get drivers pending verification (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Filters:** Only drivers with 'pending' verification status

Update driver current location

**Real-time:** Used for order assignment and tracking
**Coordinates:** [longitude, latitude] format
Get all notifications for current user
Get specific notification by ID

Create new notification (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Notification Types:**
- `order_status` - Order status updates
- `payment` - Payment notifications
- `delivery` - Delivery updates
- `system` - System notifications
- `promotional` - Marketing messages
Update notification content
Delete notification

Get unread notifications only

**Filter:** `read: false`

Mark specific notification as read

**Sets:** `read: true`

Mark all user notifications as read

**Updates:** All notifications with `read: false` to `read: true`

Get comprehensive dashboard statistics

**Access:** Admin role required
**Returns:**
- Total users, customers, drivers, store owners
- Total stores and orders
- Completed vs pending orders
- Total transactions and revenue
- Pending driver verifications

Get all users with full details (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Excludes:** Password fields for security

Get all stores with owner information (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required

Get all orders with full context (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Includes:** Customer, store, and driver details

Get all drivers with verification status (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required

Get all payment transactions (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Includes:** User and order context

Update system settings (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Note:** Currently returns confirmation (settings stored in .env in this implementation)

Get current system settings (Admin only)

**Access:** Admin role required
**Returns:**
- Commission rate
- Delivery fee
- Currency
- App version
- Feature flags
